globalNetworkId.description: The ID of the Global Network to create the site in.

location.description: The site location as documented below.

tags.description: Key-value tags for the Site. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
